subject: chore(cleanup): remove legacy conventions, tabs, and split panel code
body:
Delete 8 files no longer used after the UI restructure:
- ConventionsPage.tsx/.css (replaced by ConventionsModal)
- SplitPanel.tsx (replaced by DetailDrawer)
- useConventions.ts (conventions are now static data)
- useAppMode.ts + test (tab navigation removed)
- conventionService.ts + test (IndexedDB persistence no longer needed)

Also removed from shared modules:
- ConventionRules interface from types
- AppTab type and AppState interface from types
- createConventionRules factory function
- ConventionRules import from database (table kept in schema
  for IndexedDB compatibility but no longer typed)

Tags: cleanup, conventions, tabs, split-panel
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: ui-refinement
Semver: patch
title: remove legacy conventions, tabs, and split panel code
